title: Is An All Intel Gaming PC Worth It?
description: New Customer Exclusive  $25 Off ALL Processors:  Redeem a free 128GB Flash Drive when you sign up for Early Access to Micro Centers new Indianapolis store, opening summer 2023:  Save $200 on the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR Gaming Laptop:  Submit your build, receive a $25 off coupon when approved:   Shop Intel i7-12700K 12 Core Processor:  Shop ASUS Z690-P Prime DDR5 Motherboard:  Shop G.Skill Flare X5 16GB DDR5-5600 Dual Channel Memory:  Bundle the Intel i7-12700K, ASUS Z690-P, and G.Skill Flare X5 to save $150+ :  Shop Intel Arc A750 Limited Edition Dual Fan 8GB Graphics Card:  Shop WD Black SN770 1TB M.2 SSD:  Shop DeepCool AG400 ARGB Single Tower Cooler  White:  Shop PowerSpec 650 Watt 80 Plus Bronze Power Supply:  Shop Montech SKY TWO Tempered Glass Mid-Tower Case:   Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 Intel Inside? 0:49 PC Parts 2:31 Unboxing  3:35 Build Montage 4:36 Is Arc Good for Video? 5:48 CS:GO 6:03 DOTA 2 6:24 Apex Legends 7:06 GTA 5 7:26 CoD Warzone 2.0 8:03 Cyberpunk 2077 10:33 Is All Intel Worth It?
